src:
野球、日本が逆転で初戦白星

05 Nov 2019

　【桃園（台湾）共同】野球の東京五輪予選を兼ねた国際大会「第２回プレミア１２」は５日、台湾で１次ラウンドＢ組が開幕し、日本は桃園でベネズエラに８-４で逆転勝ちした。
　日本は０-１の五回に広島の菊池涼と鈴木の適時打で逆転。再びリードを許したが、２-４の八回に三つの押し出し四球と菊池涼の適時打、鈴木の犠飛などで６点を挙げた。
　１次ラウンドの各組の上位２チームが１１日から日本で行われる２次ラウンドに進む。決勝と３位決定戦は１７日に東京ドームで行われる。
text:
Baseball, Japan reversal in first battle

05 Nov 2019

[Cooperating with Taoyuan (Taiwan)] The 2nd Premier 12 international tournament, which also served as the Tokyo Olympics qualifier for the baseball season, opened the first round B group in Taiwan on the 5th. I won.
In Japan, the 5th round of 0-1 was reversed by the timely hits of Ryo Kikuchi and Suzuki in Hiroshima. He allowed the lead again, but scored 6 points in the 2-4 rounds with three extruded four balls and Ryo Kikuchi's timely hit and Suzuki's sacrifice.
上位 The top two teams from each group in the first round will advance to the second round in Japan starting on the 11th. The final and 3rd place will be held at Tokyo Dome on the 17th.
